thread.title: Watch Justin Timberlake Photobomb Emma Stone's Oscars Red Carpet Interview (VIDEO)
thread.title_full: Watch Justin Timberlake Photobomb Emma Stone's Oscars Red Carpet Interview (VIDEO)

title: Watch Justin Timberlake Photobomb Emma Stone's Oscars Red Carpet Interview (VIDEO)
text:
Watch Justin Timberlake Photobomb Emma Stone's Oscars Red Carpet Interview (VIDEO) posted by Marc Inocencio - share 
Minutes before Justin Timberlake opened the 89th Annual Academy Awards with a feel-good performance of his nominated single " Can't Stop The Feeling ," the singer made sure to pull a prank on his colleague, Emma Stone , during red carpet arrivals Sunday afternoon. 
While the La La Land actress, who is nominated for best actress in a leading role, was chatting with Vanity Fair , Timberlake creeped up from behind and served a stunned look. Stone joked that she did not know who "these" people were, including JT's wife Jessica Biel . Hilarious moment on the #Oscars red carpet as Justin Timberlake photobombs Emma Stone. https://t.co/LOhkJ3ZP65 pic.twitter.com/prnkDRkaj9 â€” ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2017 
Timberlake opened the Oscars with his Trolls contribution that featured a verse from Bill Withers ' "Lovely Day." The song is nominated for best original song, competing against "City of Stars" and "Audition (The Fools Who Dream)" from La La Land , "The Empty Chair" from Jim: The James Foley Story , and "How Far I'll Go" from Moana . 
The Jimmy Kimmel -hosted awards ceremony is broadcasting live from the Dolby Theatre in Los Angeles.
